body: Today while I was in class, my science teacher pulls up a video on his promethean board about human intercourse. After we watch the video my teacher accidentally shows a Hentai picture of Akko being fucked by a sexy man. The whole class started calling the teacher Mr.Coomer and then everyone started going ape shit in the classroom. One of the people in the room recorded what happened and posted it on Snapchat. Everyone at the school found out about the situation, even the principal at our school found out about the situation. He ended up firing Mr.Coomer for showing Hentai to everyone in the classroom. So if you're a teacher don't forget to be careful!
